overview: Laura is a blonde with a sexy overbite. Sitting on a beach, she daydreams of a visit to Hamburg where she showed her sex obsession in nearly every situation she found herself - at a photo shoot, at her friends, at the squash court, in a lift and an air port car park (greatly disconcerting a car thief), culminating in an orgy at a dinner party.
tagline: Mix Business With Pleasure? (Every Chance I Get!)
title: Laura's Desires
